means: 骇人听闻的，令人震惊的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"害怕的，怕的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: afraid, fearful, awful, dreadful, frightful, terrible, horrible, terrific, appalling
means: afraid ：指由于胆小或怯懦而不敢说或做某事。
fearful ：普通用词，既指外界情况变化而引起的恐惧，又指来自内心的害怕与焦虑。
awful ：指威严得令人害怕或敬畏，有一定的感情色彩。
dreadful ：指使人非常恐惧，毛骨悚然，也使人感到讨厌而退缩。
frightful ：指使人陷入短暂的惊恐或产生毛骨悚然的感觉。
terrible ：侧重指给人以长久的惊骇，极端的恐怖，令人难以忍受。
horrible ：指因骇人听闻的丑恶而令人毛骨悚然，着重厌恶的成分多于害怕。
terrific ：多指外表、形状或力量等的可怕。
appalling ：指既令害怕又使人惊异、胆寒。

sentence.Network_en: They have been living under the most appalling conditions for two months.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经在恶劣不堪的条件下生活两个月了。

sentence.Network_en: The prospect of waiting around just twiddling his thumbs was appalling.
sentence.Network_cn: 想到将要无所事事，他就非常害怕。

sentence.Network_en: Helicopters fly in appalling weather to succour shipwrecked mariners.
sentence.Network_cn: 直升机在恶劣的天气条件下起飞前去援救遇难的船员。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... appalling crimes 骇人听闻的罪行 appalling 令人震惊的 appallingly 毛骨悚然地.
2009年，当时的首相布朗向图灵道歉，称对他的审判是骇人（appalling）的，但未正式平反图灵的“罪行”。当前平均分: 打分后显示  -5 …
《Friends》词汇表A ... avery n. 艾弗里 appalling adj. 令人震惊的, 骇人听闻的 impatient adj. 不耐烦的, 急躁的, 不耐心的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... sprinkling 点滴，少数 appalling 骇人的，可怕的. compelling 引起兴趣的.

list.abs: I ' ve never seen such appalling behaviour ., 我从来没见过这麽恶劣的行为.
职称英语速记过关手... ... substantial significant 重要的 164 appalling dreadful 令人害怕的 165 anyhow anyway 不管怎样 167.
09年职称英语考试必备词汇 - 豆丁网 ... barren bare 贫瘠 appalling dreadful 使人吃惊 anyhow anyway 不管.
akurgimx - 天涯问答 ... Oh God,here we go again! 天啊，又来(这一套)了 It's appalling! 真吓人 It’s scary! 真可怕.
appall 使胆寒appalling crimes 骇人听闻的罪行appalling 令人震惊的

entry.tran: 令人震惊的；使人惊骇的；极为恶劣的
entry.def: Something that is appalling is so bad or unpleasant that it shocks you.

example.ex: They have been living under the most appalling conditions for two months.
example.tran: 他们已经在恶劣不堪的条件下生活两个月了。

entry.def: You can use appalling to emphasize that something is very great or severe.

sentences.sentence: "is it better to view the appalling or merely hear of it?"

auth_sentence.content: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed quite appalling conditions they have been living in.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed quite appalling conditions they have been living in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed quite appalling conditions they have been living in.

sentences.en: It is appalling that child was murdered.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子被害了, 令人震惊。
